text:
Proclamation under the Anti-Discrimination Act 1998

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Anti-Discrimination Act 1998 fix 10 December 1999 as the day on which that Act commences.

29 November 1999

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

J. A. BACON

For and on behalf of the Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 8 December 1999

This proclamation is administered in the Department Justice and Industrial Relations.
